column1: Smoque BBQ////I ordered a brisket platter with cornbread and baked beans as sides. Honestly
column2: the sides were the best part of the meal for me. The brisket
column4: was kinda bland. I didn't even finish it
column5: despite the not-huge portion because it was not satisfying to my palate. I've had better barbecue in Chicago and don't get the hype surrounding this place.
